    {{ cartItem.price | currency }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Cart } from '../../../shared/model/cart'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/services/cart.service'; import { CartItem } from 'src/app/shared/model/Cartitem'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart-page', templateUrl: './cart-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart-page.component.css'] }) export class CartPageComponent implements OnInit { cart!:Cart constructor(private cartService:CartService){ this.cartService.getCartObservable().subscribe((cart)=>{ this.cart= cart; }) } ngOnInit(): void { } removeFromCart(cartItem:CartItem){ this.cartService.removeFromCart(cartItem.product.id); } changeQuantity(cartItem:CartItem,quantityInString:string){ const quantity = parseInt(quantityInString); this.cartService.changeQuantity(cartItem.product.id,quantity) } }
